City Council
============

102 Rochester Street West Rainier WA 98576

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/102+Rochester+Street+West+Rainier+WA+98576)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

102 Rochester Street West  
Rainier, WA 98576

Phone:

[360-446-2265](tel:3604462265)

Fax:

360-446-2720

Link: [City Council](https://www.cityofrainierwa.org/1240/City-Council)  
  

Hours of Operation
------------------

* Monday through Thursday, 8 am to 5 pm.
* We are closed on major holidays.
